name: Ocean Cleaner
description:
Ocean Cleaner

Ocean Cleaner Is A Simple Clicker Game... Created On Android... :3. With Twine 2...

To Play This Game Is Simple... You Need To Click "Lift Garbage" To Get Money... After You Get Enough Money... You Can Spend Your Money On Shops...  Every Time You Buy Something... The Price Double Up... :3. But The More You Spent... The More Easier To Reach The "Goal"... :3.

Here Is The Video On How I Made This Game... It's Kinda Short... Sorry... :3.

Thanks For Playing... :3.
